title: FS: Some tougher T206's, HOFer's, all PSA graded......PRICES REDUCED

posts.post_title: FS: Some tougher T206's, HOFer's, all PSA graded......PRICES REDUCED
posts.post_content:
For sale are nine PSA-graded T206's. Two HOFer's and a variety of tougher cards. Payment can be made by check, money order, or Paypal "money owed"(preferred) or "gift" to my email address [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url] 
Prices include shipping with delivery confirmation. Thanks.


Tony Thebo PSA 4 (tough Southern Leaguer)   $SOLD
Moose Grimshaw PSA 6 (only 13 higher all backs)  $210
HOF'er Roger Bresnahan portrait PSA 4 (centered and tougher SC 150 Fac. 649 overprint) $SOLD
HOF'er Jake Beckley PSA 5 (excellent registration and color)  SOLD
Harry Howell portrait PSA 6 (only 15 higher all backs)  $200
Fred Merkle throwing PSA 5 (centered and tougher SC 350-460 Fac. 642 overprint) $SOLD
Phil Poland PSA 4 (Sovereign 350) SOLD
Harry Lord PSA 4.5 (El Principe de Gales)   SOLD
Peter O'Brien PSA 6 (very tough...only 9 higher all backs) $225

I'll take the Lord EPDG. Please confirm via email that I have it.

Thanks,

[url]cardman222001@yahoo.com[/url]
Hi Adam.......email sent. The EPDG Harry Lord is yours. Thanks

The Beckley and Poland will ship tomorrow.

Thank You Tony (Beckley) and Thank You Rob (Poland)

Enjoy the cards guys!
